Purpose: AI Gateway - API Runtime Endpoint (handles API traffic through DataPower)
AI Gateway - Gateway Manager UI/API (DataPower management interface)
Analytics - AI Ingestion Endpoint (receives analytics data from AI Gateway via mTLS)
Developer Portal - Admin Interface (Drupal admin for portal site management)
Developer Portal - Web UI (public-facing API catalog for consumers)
Gateway v6 - API Runtime Endpoint (handles API traffic through DataPower v6)
Gateway v6 - Gateway Manager UI/API (DataPower v6 management interface)
Management - Cloud Admin UI (Cloud Manager for platform administration)
Management - API Manager UI (for API providers to manage APIs and products)
Management - Consumer API (REST API used by Developer Portal for consumer operations)
Management - Consumer Catalog API (catalog-scoped consumer API endpoint)
Management - Platform API (admin automation REST API for platform-level operations)
NanoGateway - Management Endpoint (registration endpoint for NanoGateway cluster)
webMethods API Gateway - API Runtime Endpoint (handles API traffic through webMethods gateway)
webMethods API Gateway - Management UI/Proxy Endpoint (admin interface for webMethods gateway)
